job_title: Senior Project/Program Manager in Toronto, ON
pros: Good industry contacts. Broad view of nuclear.

review_title: COG, the place retirees go to retire again
pros: There are good people there who are willing to teach you the project life cycle and other aspects of the nuclear industry. It's a good place to cut your teeth on fast paced projects. They do have benefits (80%, no eye care coverage) if you can manage to get hired on full-time. Their IT department is top notch and very flexible and accommodating to the rest of the staff.
cons: There is no upward momentum. The core staff are mostly retirees from OPG and so there is a lot of OPG (aka. government) legacy issues as far as corporate culture is concerned. They are completely inflexible on flex time for anyone who isn't a manager even though they have a SharePoint based environment that allows almost everyone to be able to do their jobs from home if need be.
